short_summary: To replace the breeching of the emergency power diesel generator at Charlottetown Laboratory.
description: INVITATION TO TENDERDiesel Generator Breeching ReplacementCharlottetown Laboratory93 Mount Edward Road, Charlottetown, PE C1A 5T1The Charlottetown Laboratory is currently accepting bids for the removal and installation of new breeching for the facilities emergency power diesel generator...
full_summary:
====================

**Tender Title:**

* English:   Charlottetown Laboratory - Diesel Generator Breeching Replacement
* French:    Laboratoire de Charlottetown - Remplacement de la culasse de la génératrice diesel

**Tender Reference:**

* Reference Number: PW-22-01008573
* Amendment Number: 0
* Solicitation Number: A0123A (2023-00454)

**Publication and Closing Dates:**

* Publication Date: 2022-09-28
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-27T14:00:00

**Tender Details:**

This tender is for the removal and installation of a new diesel generator breeching for the facilities' emergency power diesel generator at the Charlottetown Laboratory.

**Work Duration:**

The Contractor must complete the work by March 31, 2023.

**Mandatory Site Visit:**

A site visit is scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 10:00 a.m. (Prince Edward Island time) at the Charlottetown Laboratory (93 Mount Edward Road, Charlottetown, PE C1A 5T1). Interested bidders are required to meet at the front entrance.

**Submission of Bid:**

Bids must be submitted only to the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) Bid Receiving by the date, time, and place indicated on the bid solicitation.

**Contracting Entity:**

* Canadian Food Inspection Agency
* Address: 1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0Y9, Canada
* End User Entity:  Same as above

**Trade Agreements:**

The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**

* Canada
* Region of Delivery: Prince Edward Island

**Points of Contact:**

* Ashley Bennett
* Ashley.Bennett@inspection.gc.ca
* 343-553-9512

**Attachments:**

* [Attachment: Invitation to Tender](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/ee826b05bfe6c1fc5e04109970d3d53b/a0123a_-_invitation_to_tender.pdf)
* [Attachment: Tender Document (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/a880a
